name: Refyne
description: Refyne is Asia’s leading financial wellness suite, empowering employees to achieve financial well-being. We champion financial wellness as a basic right, addressing the underserved with Salary On-Demand since 2021. Our holistic approach includes immediate liquidity access, financial education, and protection, ensuring a comprehensive financial journey. Refyne is committed to making financial wellness accessible and transforming lives across the working class in Asia.
Headline: 360° Financial Wellness Platform for your Employees
ShortDescription: Pioneer of income streaming for the workforce of India

Highlights.name: Financial Tools
Highlights.description: Access various financial tools like PF tracker, Tax Calculator & many more.

Highlights.name: Salary On-Demand
Highlights.description: Flexibility to withdraw earned salary in advance for short-term and long-term needs at 0% interest.

Highlights.name: Refyne Privileges
Highlights.description: Discounts and cashback of up to 35% on your favourite electronic gadgets and tools on transactions with Refyne.

enhanced_description: Refyne is Asia’s leading financial wellness suite, pioneering income streaming for the workforce of India since 2021. It empowers employees to achieve financial well-being through a holistic approach that includes immediate liquidity access via Salary On-Demand (at 0% interest), financial education with tools like PF tracker and Tax Calculator, and financial protection. Additionally, it offers Refyne Privileges providing discounts and cashback. The platform emphasizes accessibility and aims to improve employee happiness and engagement across the working class in Asia, featuring 100% customisation, zero integration cost, and compatibility with any HRMS.
